actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered pursuant to H. Res. 237.
Pursuant to  the provisions of H. Res. 237, the amendment was considered as adopted in the Committee of the Whole and in the House.

purpose: An amendment, considered as having been adopted in the Committee of the Whole and in the House pursuant to H. Res. 237, consisting of the text of the bill S. 1254, as passed by the Senate.
